AI Search from Chrome Search Bar

Fast and Easy AI-Powered Search

AI Search has revolutionized how we interact with technology! This powerful AI tool can answer questions and engage in dialogue seamlessly. With the AI Search extension, you get a faster and more convenient way to access and use this amazing tool.

How to Use AI Search:

There are two ways to perform a search with AI Search:

From the Omni Bar: Type a question into your Omni bar and hit Enter. As long as your query ends with a ‘?’, AI Search will handle your request through ChatGPT. If your query isn't in question form, your search will be redirected to Yahoo.com.

From Any Website: Highlight any text on a website, right-click, and select ‘Search AI Search for “Your Highlighted Text”’. If the highlighted text is a question, AI Search will process it, via ChatGPT. Non-question text will redirect your search to Yahoo.com.

For questions or support, email us at info@aiassistantt.com.
To uninstall the extension, follow the instructions at https://aiassistantt.com/#faq

Our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions are available on our website.
